[SOURCE]: The traditional marriage that is held in such high esteem is a relatively recent construct, perhaps 100 years old. Multiple studies have shown that children raised by same-sex parents do as well as those from a straight home; sometimes they do even better.  I have a goodly number of friends in committed relationships (two going back over 40 years) who have children;  these kids are brought up in a warm, supportive, loving home. The statement from T. Hansen about [t]he accumulated wisdom of 5000 years is germane to nothing.
